## About

Thank you for visiting the [Rubber Roofing Direct](https://www.rubberroofingdirect.co.uk/) [github](https://github.com/) organization page. Here you will find any publically available documentation, repositories, and packages release for public consumption by [Rubber Roofing Direct](https://www.rubberroofingdirect.co.uk/), this may include:

- Organization scoped packages published to registries such as [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/)
- Repositories describing suggested standards and best practices, especially for internal use within the organization
- Template repositories
